page.title: 09Shops
page.content: I am called Rose Lilley.My family at home is very large,Seven children so we have to do lots of shopping.Once every two or three months we buy food in bulk at the cash'n'carry.We get deliveries on certain days.We get milk,cream,papers and cigarettes.Our house isn't decorated so we get furniture and things for the house.We usually go to the butchers every Saturday to buy meat for Sunday lunch.We get clothes all the time through the year.We go to our nearest town,Bodmin, to get other food.As well as going to the cash'n'carry in Truro.
